page.title: 17CEDDESFELD HALL,SEDGEFIELD
page.content: FORMERLY THE RECTORY{CEDDESFELD { HALL}IS NOW A COMMUNITY CENTRE. SEDGEFIELD WAS ORIGINALLY KNOWN AS CEDDESFELD OR SEGESFELD. THERE WAS SAID TO BE A GHOST CALLED "THE PICKLED PARSON." NOW AS THE COMMUNITY CENTRE IT PROVIDES A WIDE RANGE OF FACILITIES, SUCH AS,YOUTH CLUB,WINEMAKERS GUILD, GARDENING CLUB,KEEP FIT,CARPET BOWLS,SQUASH RACKETS,PHOTOGRAPHIC CLUB,LYRIC SINGERS,SEDGEFIELD PLAYERS,QUIZ,DANCE,TEA-DANCE,BALLET,LA DIES CLUB,WHIST,BRIDGE,CHESS,MOTHER AND TODDLER,PLAYGROUP,GOLF SECTION,CATERING SECTION,SOCIAL CLUB AND SPORTS HALL SECTION.
